name: RGB Smash - Mix and Match Color Lines
name_original: RGB Smash - Mix and Match Color Lines
description:
RGB Smash is a color matching game where you have to use 3 colors (Red, Green and Blue) to create other colors (yellow, magenta, cyan and white) in right the right order. As the game goes on, the game gets harder and faster! How far can you go?

- Addictive and challenging gameplay
- Completely FREE to play
- Full Game Center integration
- Challenge friends to beat your high score in 1 on 1 matches through Playwin
